æ•°å¹´å‰ã€React ã‚’å­¦ã³å§‹ã‚ãŸã¨ãã€React ã¯ã¾ã‚‹ã§å¹³è¡Œä¸–ç•Œã«å­˜åœ¨ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã§ã€ç†è§£ã™ã‚‹ã®ãŒé›£ã—ã‹ã£ãŸã§ã™ã€‚

ã“ã® Hook ã‚’è¦‹ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€ã“ã‚Œã¯ã‚ã¾ã‚Šã«ã‚‚åäººé¡çš„ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã§ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ

Python ã‹ã‚‰å§‹ã‚ã‚ˆã†â€‹

ã‚ãªãŸã‚‚ç§ã¨åŒã˜ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€Python ã®æ–¹ãŒå¾—æ„ã ã¨æ€ã†ã®ã§ã€ã¾ãšã¯ Python ã‹ã‚‰å§‹ã‚ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ï¼

ã¾ãšæœ€åˆã«ã€æœ€ã‚‚ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãªã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’è¦‹ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚React ã§ã¯ã€æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«æ›¸ãã¾ã™ï¼š

import { useState } from "react";

function Counter() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  function handleClick() {
    setCount(count + 1);
  }

  return <button onClick={handleClick}>Clicked! Count = {count}</button>;
}

export default Counter;

ã‚‚ã—ã“ã‚Œã‚’ Python ã§æ›¸ã„ãŸã‚‰ã€ã©ã†æ›¸ãã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ

ç°¡å˜ã ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿã‚‚ã¡ã‚ã‚“ OOP ã§æ›¸ãã¾ã™ã‚ˆã­ï¼

ä¼çµ±çš„ãª OOP ã®æ›¸ãæ–¹â€‹

ç§ã¯ã“ã‚“ãªé¢¨ã«æ›¸ãã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®å•é¡Œè‡ªä½“ã¯é›£ã—ãã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ï¼š

class Counter:

    def __init__(self):
        self.count = 0

    def handle_click(self):
        self.count += 1
        self.render()

    def render(self):
        print(f"Clicked! Count = {self.count}")


# ä½¿ç”¨ä¾‹
counter = Counter()
counter.handle_click()  # ä¸€å›ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯

ã§ã™ãŒã€ã“ã®æ›¸ãæ–¹ã¯ä¸Šè¨˜ã® React ã¨ã¯ãªã‹ãªã‹æ¯”è¼ƒã—ã«ãã„ã®ã§ã€åˆ¥ã®æ›¸ãæ–¹ã‚’è©¦ã—ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ï¼š

é–¢æ•°å‹ + çŠ¶æ…‹ã®ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°â€‹

ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã‚’ä½¿ã‚ãšã€ç›´æ¥é–¢æ•°ã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ã¦ã€ã€ŒçŠ¶æ…‹ã€ã¨ã€Œæç”»ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ã€ã‚’åˆ†ã‘ã€ç´”ç²‹é–¢æ•°ã¨ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ£ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’ç®¡ç†ã—ã¾ã™ï¼š

def use_state(initial_value):

    state = {"value": initial_value}

    def get_value():
        return state["value"]

    def set_value(new_value):
        state["value"] = new_value

    return get_value, set_value

ã“ã“ã¾ã§æ¥ã‚‹ã¨ã€å°‘ã—ä¼¼ã¦ããŸæ„Ÿã˜ãŒã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã‹ï¼Ÿ

æ¬¡ã«ã€çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ã¾ã™ï¼š

def render():
    print(f"Clicked! Count = {get_count()}")

def handle_click():
    set_count(get_count() + 1)
    render()

ãŠã‚„ï¼Ÿã“ã‚Œã£ã¦ã€å…ˆç¨‹ React ã§ã‚„ã£ãŸã“ã¨ã¨åŒã˜ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã§ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ

OOP vs é–¢æ•°å‹â€‹

ã€Œãªãœ React ã¯ OOP ã‚’ä½¿ã‚ãªã„ã®ã‹ï¼Ÿã€ã¨ç–‘å•ã«æ€ã†ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã‚’ä½¿ã†æ–¹ãŒç›´æ„Ÿçš„ã§ã¯ãªã„ã‹ï¼Ÿå…ˆã»ã© Python ã§æ›¸ã„ãŸCounterã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€çŠ¶æ…‹ã¯ä¸€ç›®ã§ã‚ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã™ã‚ˆã­ï¼

ã‚‚ã†ä¸€åº¦ã€å…ˆã»ã©ã®ä¾‹ã‚’æŒ¯ã‚Šè¿”ã‚Šã€ã“ã® 2 ã¤ã®è€ƒãˆæ–¹ãŒã€ŒçŠ¶æ…‹ç®¡ç†ã€ã«ãŠã„ã¦ã©ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ç•°ãªã‚‹ã‹ã‚’è¦‹ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

Python ã® OOP ã§ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½œã‚‹å ´åˆã€ã“ã®æ›¸ãæ–¹ã¯ã¾ã‚‹ã§ãƒ‡ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’æ›¸ãã‚ˆã†ãªã‚‚ã®ã§ã™ã€‚ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆå…¨ä½“ãŒ 1 ã¤ã®ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã®ä¸­ã«åŒ…ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ï¼š

  • self.count ãŒçŠ¶æ…‹ã€‚
  • handle_click ãŒã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆå‡¦ç†ã€‚
  • render ãŒç”»é¢æ›´æ–°ã€‚

åˆ©ç‚¹ã¯æ§‹é€ ãŒæ˜ç¢ºã§ã€å‹•ä½œãŒã‚«ãƒ—ã‚»ãƒ«åŒ–ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã™ã€‚

ã—ã‹ã—å•é¡Œã¯ã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆãŒè¤‡é›‘ã«ãªã‚‹ã«ã¤ã‚Œã¦ã€è¤‡æ•°ã®çŠ¶æ…‹ï¼ˆä¾‹ãˆã°ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ã€èƒŒæ™¯è‰²ã€ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãªã©ï¼‰ã‚’ç®¡ç†ã—ãªã‘ã‚Œã°ãªã‚‰ãªããªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã‚’ã™ã¹ã¦selfã«è©°ã‚è¾¼ã‚“ã§ã„ãã¨ã€ã™ãã«æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªçŠ¶æ…‹ã«ãªã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã„ã¾ã™ï¼š

ãã—ã¦ã€ã‚ãªãŸã¯äººç”Ÿã«ç–‘å•ã‚’æŠ±ãå§‹ã‚ã‚‹ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

React ã¯ Hook ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã€çŠ¶æ…‹ã®ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’å€‹åˆ¥ã®å°ã•ãªé–¢æ•°ã«åˆ†è§£ã—ã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆæ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’ã€Œçµ„ã¿ç«‹ã¦ã‚‹ã€ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

ç§ãŸã¡ã®use_stateã‚’è¦šãˆã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ

get_count, set_count = use_state(0)

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€get_count()ã¨set_count()ã® 2 ã¤ã®é–¢æ•°ãŒå¾—ã‚‰ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã¯ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã§æƒ…å ±ã‚’ä¿æŒã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãªãã€ã©ã“ã§ã‚‚ä½¿ç”¨ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

ã“ã‚ŒãŒ Hook ã®æœ¬è³ªã§ã™ï¼šçŠ¶æ…‹ã¯ãã“ã«å›ºå®šã•ã‚Œã¦ãŠã‚Šã€get_count()ã‚„set_count()ã•ãˆã‚ã‚Œã°ã€ã„ã¤ã§ã‚‚å–å¾—ã—ã¦æ›´æ–°ã§ãã‚‹ã®ã§ã™ã€‚ã¾ã‚‹ã§ãƒ•ãƒƒã‚¯ï¼ˆHookï¼‰ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ãã®çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’å¼•ã£æ›ã‘ã€å¿…è¦ãªæ™‚ã«ãã‚Œã‚’å¼•ãå‡ºã™ã‚ˆã†ãªã‚‚ã®ã§ã™ã€‚

ä¿¡ã˜ã‚‰ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã‹ï¼Ÿãã‚Œãªã‚‰ã€æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚ã€Œ5 å›ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã™ã‚‹ã”ã¨ã«ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ã™ã‚‹ã€æ©Ÿèƒ½ã§ã™ã€‚

  • OOP ã§æ›¸ãå ´åˆ

    class Counter:

        def __init__(self):
            self.count = 0

        def handle_click(self):
            self.count += 1
            if self.count % 5 == 0:
                print("ğŸ‰ 5å›ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã¾ã—ãŸï¼")
            self.render()

        def render(self):
            print(f"Clicked! Count = {self.count}")

  • é–¢æ•°å‹ã§æ›¸ãå ´åˆ

    get_count, set_count = use_state(0)

    def use_celebrate_every(n):
        def check():
            if get_count() % n == 0 and get_count() != 0:
                print(f"ğŸ‰ {n}å›ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã¾ã—ãŸï¼")
        return check

    celebrate = use_celebrate_every(5)

    def handle_click():
        set_count(get_count() + 1)
        celebrate()
        render()

    def render():
        print(f"Clicked! Count = {get_count()}")

    ã“ã“ã§ã¯ã€ã€Œn å›ã”ã¨ã«ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ã™ã‚‹ã€ã¨ã„ã†æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’use_celebrate_every(n)ã¨ã„ã†ç‹¬ç«‹ã—ãŸ Hook ã¨ã—ã¦åˆ†ã‘ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ã“ã® Hook ã¯ã€å®šæœŸçš„ã«ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ãŒå¿…è¦ãªä»–ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã«ã‚‚ä½¿ç”¨ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

    ã“ã‚ŒãŒé–¢æ•°å‹ã®åŠ›ã§ã™ï¼šæ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã¨ã—ã¦åˆ†è§£ã—ã€å†åˆ©ç”¨ã€å†æ§‹æˆã€å…±æœ‰ãŒã—ã‚„ã™ããªã‚‹ã®ã§ã™ã€‚

ã—ã‹ã—ã€é–¢æ•°å‹ã¯è¦‹ãŸç›®ãŒè¤‡é›‘ã™ãã‚‹ã¨æ„Ÿã˜ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ï¼

å¿ƒé…ã—ãªã„ã§ã€æ¬¡ã«ã‚‚ã†ä¸€ã¤ã®ä¾‹ã‚’è¦‹ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

å®Ÿéš›ã€ã‚‚ã—å˜ç´”ãªãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’ä½œã‚‹ã ã‘ãªã‚‰ã€OOP ã®æ–¹ãŒé–¢æ•°å‹ã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ãšã£ã¨ç›´æ„Ÿçš„ã§ã™ã€‚

ã—ã‹ã—ã€React ã¯ã€Œãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’ä½œã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ã‚ã‚‹ã‚ã‘ã§ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€ã€‚React ã®ç›®çš„ã¯ã€ã€Œã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³å…¨ä½“ã‚’çµ„ã¿ç«‹ã¦ã‚‹ã€ãŸã‚ã«ã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§ã™ã€‚

ã ã‹ã‚‰ç§ãŸã¡ãŒå•ã†ã¹ãã“ã¨ã¯ã€å®Ÿã¯ã€Œã©ã¡ã‚‰ãŒç°¡å˜ã‹ï¼Ÿã€ã§ã¯ãªãã€ã€Œç‰©äº‹ãŒè¤‡é›‘ã«ãªã£ãŸã¨ãã€ã©ã¡ã‚‰ãŒè€ãˆã‚‰ã‚Œã‚‹ã‹ï¼Ÿã€ãªã®ã§ã™ã€‚

ä»®ã«ã€æœ€åˆã«ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãªã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’æ›¸ã„ãŸã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã§ï¼š

å•é¡Œãªã—ã€ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã§ç¶ºéº—ã§ã™ã€‚

ã—ã‹ã—ã€æ¬¡ã«ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ€ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ¼ãŒæ¥ã¦ã€ã“ã†è¨€ã„ã¾ã™ï¼š

  1. ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚¤ãƒ³æ™‚ã«ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ã€‚
  2. ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯ 3 ç§’å¾Œã«è‡ªå‹•ã§æ¶ˆãˆã‚‹ã€‚
  3. ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã®ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’è¨˜æ†¶ã—ã€localStorage ã«ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚‹ã€‚
  4. å…¥åŠ›å¾Œã€ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã«è‡ªå‹•ã§ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚’å½“ã¦ã‚‹ã€‚
  5. ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãŒé€£ç¶šã—ã¦ 3 å›å¤±æ•—ã—ãŸå ´åˆã€ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ 30 ç§’é–“ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã™ã‚‹ã€‚

ã“ã‚Œã§ã€æ¬¡ã®ã“ã¨ã‚’å‡¦ç†ã—ãªã‘ã‚Œã°ãªã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ï¼š

  • ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚°çŠ¶æ…‹
  • ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®è¡¨ç¤ºã¨è‡ªå‹•æ¶ˆå»
  • å‰¯ä½œç”¨ï¼šlocalStorage æ“ä½œã€ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ã‚«ã‚¹åˆ¶å¾¡
  • æ™‚é–“ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ï¼šãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼

OOP ã§æ›¸ã„ãŸå ´åˆã¯ï¼Ÿâ€‹

ã“ã‚“ãªé¢¨ã«æ›¸ãã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ï¼š

        # ãã—ã¦ä¸€å †ã®ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚’æ›¸ã„ã¦ã„ãï¼šhandle_inputã€handle_submitã€handle_error...

çŠ¶æ…‹ãŒä¸€ç·’ã«è©°ã‚è¾¼ã¾ã‚Œã€ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ãŒ 10 æ•°å€‹ã®ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã«æ•£ã‚‰ã°ã£ã¦ã„ãã€‚æ°—ãŒã¤ã‘ã°çˆ†ç™ºã—ãã†ã§ã™ã€‚

ã€Œã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒ 3 ç§’å¾Œã«æ¶ˆãˆã‚‹ã€æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’å†åˆ©ç”¨ã—ãŸã„ï¼Ÿã”ã‚ã‚“ãªã•ã„ã€ãã‚Œã¯LoginFormã®ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ¼ãƒˆãªéƒ¨åˆ†ãªã®ã§ä»–ã®å ´æ‰€ã§ã¯ä½¿ãˆã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚åŒã˜æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’å†å®Ÿè£…ã™ã‚‹ã‹ã€ãã®ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã‚’ç¶™æ‰¿ã™ã‚‹ã—ã‹ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

ã§ã¯é–¢æ•°å‹ã®å ´åˆã¯ï¼Ÿâ€‹

ã“ã‚“ãªé¢¨ã«åˆ†ã‘ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ï¼š

const [username, setUsername] = useState("");
const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
const errorMessage = useTimedError(3000); // ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’3ç§’è¡¨ç¤º
useLocalStorage("last-username", username); // ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’è‡ªå‹•ã§ä¿å­˜

ãã‚Œãã‚Œã®è¦æ±‚ã¯ã€ç‹¬ç«‹ã—ãŸã€ŒHook ãƒ¢ã‚¸ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã€ã¨ã—ã¦ã‚«ãƒ—ã‚»ãƒ«åŒ–ã•ã‚Œã€ãŠäº’ã„ã«å¹²æ¸‰ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

ã¾ã‚‹ã§ç©ã¿æœ¨ã‚’çµ„ã¿ç«‹ã¦ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã§ã€çµã³ç›®ã‚’è§£ãã‚ˆã†ãªä½œæ¥­ã§ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

ã ã„ã¶æ¥½ã«ãªã£ãŸæ„Ÿã˜ãŒã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã‹ï¼Ÿ

ãªãœ OOP ã‚’æ”¾æ£„ã™ã‚‹ã®ã‹ï¼Ÿâ€‹

å®Ÿã¯ã€React ã«ã¯æœ€åˆclassã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ã“ã®æ›¸ãæ–¹ã‚’è¦šãˆã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ï¼š

class Counter extends React.Component {
  state = { count: 0 };
  handleClick = () => this.setState({ count: this.state.count + 1 });
  render() {
    return (
      <button onClick={this.handleClick}>Count = {this.state.count}</button>
    );

import React from "react";
import resumeData from "../../data/resumeData";

function ContactInfo() {
  const { phone, email, location, linkedin, github, website } = resumeData.contact;
  return (
    <div className="section">
      <h3>
        <i className="fa-solid fa-address-book"></i> Contact Information
      </h3>
      <ul className="contact-list">
        <li>
          <i className="fa-solid fa-phone"></i> {phone}
        </li>
        <li>
          <i className="fa-solid fa-envelope"></i> {email}
        </li>
        <li>
          <i className="fa-solid fa-location-dot"></i> {location}
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href={linkedin} target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">
            <i className="fa-brands fa-linkedin"></i> LinkedIn
          </a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a href={github} target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">
            <i className="fa-brands fa-github"></i> GitHub
          </a>
        </li>
      </ul>
      <a className="website-button" href={website} target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">
        <i className="fa-solid fa-globe"></i> My Website
      </a>
    </div>
  );
}

export default ContactInfo;

(async () => {
  const browser = await puppeteer.launch();

  // ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«HTMLã¾ãŸã¯ãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆURLã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã‚€
  await page.goto('http://localhost:3000/resume', {
    waitUntil: 'networkidle0',

  await page.pdf({
    path: 'resume.pdf',
    format: 'A4',
    printBackground: true,
  });

  await browser.close();
})();

Pydantic ã¯ã€Python ã§æ›¸ã‹ã‚ŒãŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿æ¤œè¨¼ãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã§ã€ã•ã¾ã–ã¾ãªä¹±é›‘ãªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã®å•é¡Œã‚’è§£æ±ºã—ã€ã¤ã„ã§ã«éš…ã£ã“ã§ã»ã“ã‚Šã‚’ã‹ã¶ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹è¨­å®šãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚‚ç®¡ç†ã—ã¦ãã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®ãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã¯ç‰¹ã«ã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚¸ãƒ‹ã‚¢ã«é©ã—ã¦ãŠã‚Šã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªå•é¡Œã‚’è§£æ±ºã—ã¾ã™ï¼š

  • ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã®å®šç¾©ï¼šãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã‚’ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã¨ã—ãŸæ–¹æ³•ã§æ›¸ã‘ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚Šã€Dict ã‚’ç„¡ä½œç‚ºã«çªã£è¾¼ã‚€ã“ã¨ãŒãªããªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

1. ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã®ä½œæˆâ€‹

4. ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«â€‹

ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚’å®šç¾©ã™ã‚‹éš›ã€Pydantic ã¯ dict ã‚’è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«å¯¾å¿œã™ã‚‹ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã«å¤‰æ›ã—ã¾ã™ï¼š

1. ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼â€‹

from pydantic import validator

class User(BaseModel):

class User(BaseModel):
    password1: str

            raise ValueError('Passwords do not match')

FastAPI ã§ã®åˆ©ç”¨â€‹

@app.post("/items/")

1. ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«â€‹

TypeVar ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦å‹å¤‰æ•° T ã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ã€å°†æ¥çš„ã«ç½®ãæ›ãˆå¯èƒ½ãªä»»æ„ã®å‹ã‚’è¡¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ResponseModel ã¯ BaseModel ã¨ Generic[T] ã‚’ç¶™æ‰¿ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã€å¿…è¦ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ç•°ãªã‚‹å‹ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å—ã‘å…¥ã‚Œã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®æ±ç”¨ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã«ã‚ˆã‚Šã€å†åˆ©ç”¨æ€§ã¨æŸ”è»Ÿæ€§ãŒå¤§å¹…ã«å‘ä¸Šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

2. éåŒæœŸå‡¦ç†â€‹

parse_obj_as ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦éåŒæœŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿è§£æã‚’å®Ÿç¾ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã¯ã€ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚„è¾æ›¸ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªå…ƒã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿æ§‹é€ ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã—ãŸ Pydantic ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã«å¤‰æ›ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚å¤§é‡ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’éåŒæœŸã§å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹å ´é¢ã§å½¹ç«‹ã¡ã¾ã™ã€‚

parse_obj_as ã¯ã€è¤‡æ•°ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å«ã‚€ã‚³ãƒ¬ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ï¼ˆã“ã®ä¾‹ã§ã¯ List[User]ï¼‰ã‚’è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«å¯¾å¿œã™ã‚‹ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã«è§£æã—ã¾ã™ã€‚éåŒæœŸç’°å¢ƒã§ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚„ API ã‹ã‚‰å–å¾—ã—ãŸ JSON ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹éš›ã«ä¾¿åˆ©ã§ã™ã€‚

4. ORM çµ±åˆâ€‹

from pydantic.orm import from_orm
from sqlalchemy.ext.declarative import declarative_base
from sqlalchemy import Column, Integer, String

Base = declarative_base()

class UserORM(Base):
    __tablename__ = "users"
    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True)
    name = Column(String)

class UserSchema(BaseModel):
    id: int

    class Config:
        orm_mode = True

ã“ã®çµ±åˆæ–¹æ³•ã¯ã€Web API é–‹ç™ºã«ç‰¹ã«é©ã—ã¦ãŠã‚Šã€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’æ¤œè¨¼ã—ãŸå¾Œã«ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã«è¿”ã™éš›ã«ã€ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®ç°¡ç•¥åŒ–ã¨ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã®å‰Šæ¸›ã«å½¹ç«‹ã¡ã¾ã™ã€‚

import os
import re
import requests
from tqdm import tqdm
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

def download_from_google(file_id: str, file_name: str, target: str = "."):
    """
    Google Driveã‹ã‚‰ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã—ã€å¤§ããªãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®ãŸã‚ã«ç¢ºèªãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã‚’å‡¦ç†ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    å¼•æ•°ï¼š
        file_id (str):
            Google Driveã‹ã‚‰ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã™ã‚‹ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®IDã€‚
        file_name (str):
            ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã—ãŸãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®ä¿å­˜åã€‚
        target (str, optional):
            ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚‹ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã€‚ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã¯ã‚«ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªï¼ˆ"."ï¼‰ã€‚

    ä¾‹å¤–ï¼š
        Exception: ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ãŸå ´åˆã‚„ã€ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã§ããªã„å ´åˆã€‚

    å‚™è€ƒï¼š
        ã“ã®é–¢æ•°ã¯å°ã•ãªãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¨å¤§ããªãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®ä¸¡æ–¹ã‚’å‡¦ç†ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚å¤§ããªãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®å ´åˆã€Googleã®ç¢ºèªãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã‚’è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«å‡¦ç†ã—ã€ã‚¦ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚¹ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³è­¦å‘Šã‚„ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºåˆ¶é™ã‚’å›é¿ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ä¾‹ï¼š
        ã‚«ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã«ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ï¼š
            download_from_google(
                file_id="xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx",
                file_name="example_file.txt"
            )

        ç‰¹å®šã®ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã«ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ï¼š
            download_from_google(
                file_id="xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx",
                file_name="example_file.txt",
                target="./downloads"
            )
    """
    # æœ€åˆã®è©¦ã¿ï¼šdocs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ID
    base_url = "https://docs.google.com/uc"
    session = requests.Session()
    params = {
        "export": "download",
        "id": file_id
    }
    response = session.get(base_url, params=params, stream=True)

    # ã™ã§ã«Content-DispositionãŒå«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚Œã°ã€ç›´æ¥ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’å–å¾—ã§ããŸã“ã¨ã‚’æ„å‘³ã—ã¾ã™
    if "content-disposition" not in response.headers:
        # æœ€åˆã«ã‚¯ãƒƒã‚­ãƒ¼ã‹ã‚‰ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã‚’å–å¾—
        token = None
        for k, v in response.cookies.items():
            if k.startswith("download_warning"):
                token = v
                break

        # ã‚¯ãƒƒã‚­ãƒ¼ã«ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ãŒãªã„å ´åˆã¯ã€HTMLã‹ã‚‰è§£æ
        if not token:
            soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, "html.parser")
            # ã‚ˆãè¦‹ã‚‰ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ï¼šHTMLå†…ã«form#download-formãŒã‚ã‚‹
            download_form = soup.find("form", {"id": "download-form"})
            if download_form and download_form.get("action"):
                # actionå†…ã®URLã‚’å–å¾—ã€é€šå¸¸ã¯drive.usercontent.google.com/download
                download_url = download_form["action"]
                # ã™ã¹ã¦ã®hiddenãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã‚’åé›†
                hidden_inputs = download_form.find_all("input", {"type": "hidden"})
                form_params = {}
                for inp in hidden_inputs:
                    if inp.get("name") and inp.get("value") is not None:
                        form_params[inp["name"]] = inp["value"]

                # ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã§å†åº¦GETãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆ
                # æ³¨æ„ï¼šå…ƒã®actionã¯ç›¸å¯¾ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã®å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€ã“ã“ã§ã¯å®Œå…¨ãªURLã‚’ä½¿ç”¨
                response = session.get(download_url, params=form_params, stream=True)
            else:
                # ã‚‚ã—ãã¯HTMLå†…ã«ç›´æ¥confirm=xxxãŒå«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã‚ã‚‹
                match = re.search(r'confirm=([0-9A-Za-z-_]+)', response.text)
                if match:
                    token = match.group(1)
                    # confirmãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã‚’å«ã‚ã¦å†åº¦docs.google.comã«ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆ
                    params["confirm"] = token
                    response = session.get(base_url, params=params, stream=True)
                else:
                    raise Exception("ãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹å†…ã§ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã¾ãŸã¯ç¢ºèªãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸã€‚ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰å¤±æ•—ã€‚")

        else:
            # ã‚¯ãƒƒã‚­ãƒ¼ã‹ã‚‰å–å¾—ã—ãŸãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦å†ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆ
            params["confirm"] = token
            response = session.get(base_url, params=params, stream=True)

    # ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰å…ˆã®ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªãŒå­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚‹ã‹ç¢ºèª
    os.makedirs(target, exist_ok=True)
    file_path = os.path.join(target, file_name)

    # ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’chunkã”ã¨ã«ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã«æ›¸ãè¾¼ã¿ã€é€²è¡ŒçŠ¶æ³ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
    try:
        total_size = int(response.headers.get('content-length', 0))
        with open(file_path, "wb") as f, tqdm(
            desc=file_name,
            total=total_size,
            unit="B",
            unit_scale=True,
            unit_divisor=1024,
        ) as bar:
            for chunk in response.iter_content(chunk_size=32768):
                if chunk:
                    f.write(chunk)
                    bar.update(len(chunk))

        print(f"ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒæ­£å¸¸ã«ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã•ã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸ: {file_path}")

    except Exception as e:
        raise Exception(f"ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ: {e}")

ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•â€‹

ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ« ID ãŒYOUR_FILE_IDã§ã€big_model.onnxã¨ã„ã†åå‰ã§./modelsãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ã«ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«å‘¼ã³å‡ºã—ã¾ã™ï¼š

download_from_google(
    file_id="YOUR_FILE_ID",
    file_name="big_model.onnx",
    target="./models"
)

å®Œäº†å¾Œã€./modelsãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ã«big_model.onnxãŒæ­£å¸¸ã«ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã•ã‚Œã€ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã§é€²è¡ŒçŠ¶æ³ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«â€‹

ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã§æ“ä½œã—ãŸã„å ´åˆã€æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¦ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒ—ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ï¼š

download_from_google_cli.py
from download_from_google import download_from_google
import argparse

def main():
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="Google Driveã‹ã‚‰ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚")
    parser.add_argument("--file-id", required=True, help="Google Driveã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«IDã€‚")
    parser.add_argument("--file-name", required=True, help="å‡ºåŠ›ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«åã€‚")
    parser.add_argument("--target", default=".", help="å‡ºåŠ›ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã€‚ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã¯ã‚«ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã€‚")
    args = parser.parse_args()

    download_from_google(file_id=args.file_id, file_name=args.file_name, target=args.target)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

ã“ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’download_from_google_cli.pyã¨ã—ã¦ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚Œã°ã€æ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‹ã‚‰å®Ÿè¡Œã§ãã¾ã™ï¼š

ç§ãŸã¡ã¯ 70MB ãŠã‚ˆã³ 900MB ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã§ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã—ã¾ã—ãŸãŒã€ã©ã¡ã‚‰ã‚‚æ­£å¸¸ã«ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ãã¾ã—ãŸã€‚900GB ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯â€¦ï¼ˆğŸ¤” ğŸ¤” ğŸ¤”ï¼‰

è©¦ã—ãŸã“ã¨ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€ãã®ã‚ˆã†ãªå¤§ããªãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¯æ‰‹å…ƒã«ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã®ã§ã€ã¾ãŸå¾Œæ—¥æ©Ÿä¼šãŒã‚ã‚Œã°æ›´æ–°ã—ã¾ã™ï¼

AIã‚„ãƒ•ãƒ«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒƒã‚¯ã®æƒ…å ±ç™ºä¿¡ã‚’ç¶šã‘ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€ã”æ”¯æ´ãŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

AIãƒ»é–‹ç™ºãƒ»é‹ç”¨ã¾ã§ä¸€æ‹¬å¯¾å¿œ

  2. ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆæƒ…å ±ã®æŠ½å‡º (extract_font_info)

    • 3: Windowsï¼ˆWindows ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ å°‚ç”¨ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆï¼‰

ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰â€‹

ä»¥ä¸‹ã¯å®Œå…¨ãªã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ã™ã€‚å‡ºåŠ›ã•ã‚ŒãŸæƒ…å ±ã‚’ JSON å½¢å¼ã§ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã€ãã®å¾Œã®åˆ†æã‚„è¿½è·¡ã«å½¹ç«‹ã¦ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

import re
import unicodedata
from pathlib import Path
from typing import List, Union

from fontTools.ttLib import TTFont


def load_ttfont(font_path: Union[str, Path], **kwargs) -> TTFont:
    """Load a TrueType font file."""
    if isinstance(font_path, Path):
        font_path = str(font_path)
    return TTFont(font_path, **kwargs)


def remove_control_characters(text: str, normalize: bool = True) -> str:
    """
    Remove control characters and invisible formatting characters from a string.

    Args:
        text (str): The input string.
        normalize (bool): Whether to normalize the text to remove inconsistencies.

    Returns:
        str: The sanitized string with control and invisible characters removed.
    """
    # Remove basic control characters (C0 and C1 control codes)
    sanitized = re.sub(r'[\x00-\x1F\x7F-\x9F]', '', text)

    # Remove specific Unicode control and invisible formatting characters
    sanitized = re.sub(
        r'[\u200B-\u200F\u2028-\u202F\u2060-\u206F]', '', sanitized)

    # Remove directional formatting characters (optional, adjust if needed)
    sanitized = re.sub(r'[\u202A-\u202E]', '', sanitized)

    # Optionally, normalize the text to remove any leftover inconsistencies
    if normalize:
        sanitized = unicodedata.normalize('NFKC', sanitized)

    return sanitized


def extract_font_info(
    font_path: Union[str, Path],
    normalize: bool = True
) -> dict:
    """Extract detailed metadata and structural information from a font file.

    Args:
        font_path (Union[str, Path]): Path to the font file.

    Returns:
        dict: A dictionary containing font metadata and tables, including:

            - fileName (str): Path to the font file.
            - tables (list): List of available tables in the font.
            - nameTable (dict): Raw name table values, keyed by nameID.
            - nameTableReadable (dict): Readable name table with keys:
                * copyright (str): Copyright information.
                * fontFamily (str): Font family name.
                * fontSubfamily (str): Font subfamily name.
                * uniqueID (str): Unique identifier for the font.
                * fullName (str): Full font name.
                * version (str): Font version string.
                * postScriptName (str): PostScript name.
            - cmapTable (dict): Character-to-glyph mappings, keyed by encoding.
            - cmapTableIndex (list): List of encoding descriptions.
            - headTable (dict): Font header table with keys:
                * unitsPerEm (int): Units per em.
                * xMin (int): Minimum x-coordinate of the glyph bounding box.
                * yMin (int): Minimum y-coordinate of the glyph bounding box.
                * xMax (int): Maximum x-coordinate of the glyph bounding box.
                * yMax (int): Maximum y-coordinate of the glyph bounding box.
            - hheaTable (dict): Horizontal header table with keys:
                * ascent (int): Typographic ascent.
                * descent (int): Typographic descent.
                * lineGap (int): Line gap.
            - OS2Table (dict): OS/2 table with keys:
                * usWeightClass (int): Weight class.
                * usWidthClass (int): Width class.
                * fsType (int): Embedding restrictions.
            - postTable (dict): PostScript table with keys:
                * isFixedPitch (bool): Whether the font is monospaced.
                * italicAngle (float): Italic angle of the font.
            - layoutMetrics (dict): Font layout metrics with keys:
                * unitsPerEm (int): Units per em.
                * boundingBox (dict): Bounding box coordinates:
                    - xMin (int): Minimum x-coordinate.
                    - yMin (int): Minimum y-coordinate.
                    - xMax (int): Maximum x-coordinate.
                    - yMax (int): Maximum y-coordinate.
                * ascent (int): Typographic ascent.
                * descent (int): Typographic descent.
                * lineGap (int): Line gap.
            - summary (dict): High-level font summary with keys:
                * fontFamily (str): Font family name.
                * fontSubfamily (str): Font subfamily name.
                * version (str): Font version.
                * weightClass (int): Weight class.
                * isItalic (bool): Whether the font is italic.
    """

    if isinstance(font_path, Path):
        font_path = str(font_path)

    font = TTFont(font_path)
    font_info = {}

    # File name and available tables
    font_info['fileName'] = font_path
    font_info['tables'] = list(font.keys())

    # Parse name table
    name_table = {}
    for record in font['name'].names:
        try:
            raw_string = record.string.decode('utf-16-be').strip()
            clean_string = remove_control_characters(raw_string, normalize)
            name_table[record.nameID] = clean_string
        except UnicodeDecodeError:
            name_table[record.nameID] = remove_control_characters(
                record.string.decode(errors='ignore'), normalize)
    font_info['nameTable'] = name_table

    # Readable name table for common nameIDs
    name_table_readable = {
        'copyright': name_table.get(0, ''),
        'fontFamily': name_table.get(1, ''),
        'fontSubfamily': name_table.get(2, ''),
        'uniqueID': name_table.get(3, ''),
        'fullName': name_table.get(4, ''),
        'version': name_table.get(5, ''),
        'postScriptName': name_table.get(6, ''),
    }
    font_info['nameTableReadable'] = {
        k: remove_control_characters(v, normalize)
        for k, v in name_table_readable.items()
    }

    # Parse cmap table
    cmap_table = {}
    cmap_table_index = []

    for cmap in font['cmap'].tables:
        platform_name = {
            0: 'Unicode',
            1: 'Macintosh',
            3: 'Windows'
        }.get(cmap.platformID, f"Platform {cmap.platformID}")

        encoding_name = {
            (0, 0): 'Unicode 1.0',
            (0, 3): 'Unicode 2.0+',
            (0, 4): 'Unicode 2.0+ with BMP',
            (1, 0): 'Mac Roman',
            (3, 1): 'Windows Unicode BMP',
            (3, 10): 'Windows Unicode Full'
        }.get((cmap.platformID, cmap.platEncID), f"Encoding {cmap.platEncID}")

        cmap_entries = {}
        for codepoint, glyph_name in cmap.cmap.items():
            char = chr(codepoint)
            cmap_entries[remove_control_characters(char, normalize)] = \
                remove_control_characters(glyph_name, normalize)

        key = f"{platform_name}, {encoding_name}"
        cmap_table[key] = cmap_entries
        cmap_table_index.append(key)

    font_info['cmapTable'] = cmap_table
    font_info['cmapTableIndex'] = cmap_table_index

    # Parse head table
    head = font['head']
    head_table = {
        'unitsPerEm': head.unitsPerEm,
        'xMin': head.xMin,
        'yMin': head.yMin,
        'xMax': head.xMax,
        'yMax': head.yMax,
    }
    font_info['headTable'] = head_table

    # Parse hhea table
    hhea = font['hhea']
    hhea_table = {
        'ascent': hhea.ascent,
        'descent': hhea.descent,
        'lineGap': hhea.lineGap,
    }
    font_info['hheaTable'] = hhea_table

    # Parse OS/2 table
    os2 = font['OS/2']
    os2_table = {
        'usWeightClass': os2.usWeightClass,
        'usWidthClass': os2.usWidthClass,
        'fsType': os2.fsType,
    }
    font_info['OS2Table'] = os2_table

    # Parse post table
    post = font['post']
    post_table = {
        'isFixedPitch': post.isFixedPitch,
        'italicAngle': post.italicAngle,
    }
    font_info['postTable'] = post_table

    # Combine layout-related metrics
    font_info['layoutMetrics'] = {
        'unitsPerEm': head_table['unitsPerEm'],
        'boundingBox': {
            'xMin': head_table['xMin'],
            'yMin': head_table['yMin'],
            'xMax': head_table['xMax'],
            'yMax': head_table['yMax']
        },
        'ascent': hhea_table['ascent'],
        'descent': hhea_table['descent'],
        'lineGap': hhea_table['lineGap']
    }

    # Font summary
    font_info['summary'] = {
        'fontFamily': name_table_readable['fontFamily'],
        'fontSubfamily': name_table_readable['fontSubfamily'],
        'version': name_table_readable['version'],
        'weightClass': os2.usWeightClass,
        'isItalic': post_table['italicAngle'] != 0
    }

    return font_info

å‡ºåŠ›çµæœã®ä¾‹â€‹

OcrB-Regular.ttf ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä¾‹ã«ã€é–¢æ•°ã‚’å‘¼ã³å‡ºã—ã¦ JSON ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«å‡ºåŠ›ã™ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®é€šã‚Šã§ã™ï¼š

import json

font_infos = extract_font_info('OcrB-Regular.ttf')
json.dump(font_infos, open('OcrB-Regular-Info.json', 'w'),
          indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)

import subprocess
import sys
from pathlib import Path

def convert_videos(input_dir: Path, src_format: str, dest_format: str):
    # ç›®æ¨™ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ãŒå­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚‹ã‹ç¢ºèª
    if not input_dir.is_dir():
        print(f"ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ '{input_dir}' ã¯å­˜åœ¨ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚")
        sys.exit(1)

    # è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«å‡ºåŠ›ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ã‚’ä½œæˆ
    output_dir = input_dir / "output"
    output_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

    # ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒƒãƒˆã®ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ã‚’è¿½åŠ 
    if not src_format.startswith("."):
        src_format = f".{src_format}"
    if not dest_format.startswith("."):
        dest_format = f".{dest_format}"

    # æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸå½¢å¼ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’æ¢ç´¢ï¼ˆå¤§æ–‡å­—å°æ–‡å­—ã‚’åŒºåˆ¥ã—ãªã„ï¼‰
    video_files = [f for f in input_dir.rglob("*") if f.suffix.casefold() == src_format.casefold()]

    if not video_files:
        print(f"{src_format}ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¯è¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸã€‚")
        sys.exit(0)

    for file in video_files:
        output_file = output_dir / f"{file.stem}{dest_format}"
        print(f"å¤‰æ›ä¸­: '{file}' -> '{output_file}'")

        # ffmpegã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’å¤‰æ›
        try:
            subprocess.run(
                [
                    "ffmpeg", "-i", str(file),
                    "-c", "copy",
                    str(output_file)
                ],
                check=True,
                stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
                stderr=subprocess.PIPE
            )
            print(f"å¤‰æ›æˆåŠŸ: '{output_file}'")
        except subprocess.CalledProcessError as e:
            print(f"å¤‰æ›å¤±æ•—: '{file}'")
            print(e.stderr.decode())

    print(f"ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒå‡¦ç†ã•ã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸã€‚å‡ºåŠ›ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€: '{output_dir}'")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    # å¼•æ•°ãŒæ­£ã—ã„ã‹ç¢ºèª
    if len(sys.argv) != 4:
        print(f"ä½¿ç”¨æ³•: python {sys.argv[0]} <ç›®æ¨™ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€> <å…ƒã®å½¢å¼> <ç›®æ¨™å½¢å¼>")
        print(f"ä¾‹: python {sys.argv[0]} 'videos' 'MOV' 'mp4'")

    input_dir = Path(sys.argv[1]).resolve()
    src_format = sys.argv[2]

    convert_videos(input_dir, src_format, dest_format)

system_checking_by_chatgpt.sh
#!/usr/bin/env bash

set -euo pipefail
# set -x  # å¿…è¦ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ãƒ‡ãƒãƒƒã‚°ç”¨ã«æœ‰åŠ¹åŒ–

########################################
# åŸºæœ¬è¨­å®šãŠã‚ˆã³ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
########################################

DATE=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d")
WORK_DIR="/var/log/system_checking_by_chatgpt"
RAW_REPORT="$WORK_DIR/raw_report_$DATE.txt"
CHUNKS_DIR="$WORK_DIR/chunks_$DATE"
SUMMARY_DIR="$WORK_DIR/summary_$DATE"
FINAL_REPORT="$WORK_DIR/final_report_$DATE.md"  # Markdownå½¢å¼ã§å‡ºåŠ›
DEBUG_LOG="$WORK_DIR/debug_$DATE.log"

mkdir -p "$WORK_DIR"
mkdir -p "$CHUNKS_DIR"
mkdir -p "$SUMMARY_DIR"

# å¿…é ˆã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã®å­˜åœ¨ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
REQUIRED_COMMANDS=("curl" "jq" "smartctl" "systemctl" "docker" "sensors")
for cmd in "${REQUIRED_COMMANDS[@]}"; do
    if ! command -v "$cmd" &>/dev/null; then
        echo "[ERROR] å¿…é ˆã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ $cmd ãŒã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚" | tee -a "$DEBUG_LOG"
        exit 1
    fi
done

# ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚¯ç©ºãå®¹é‡ã®ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ï¼ˆ100MBä»¥ä¸Šå¿…è¦ï¼‰
AVAILABLE_SPACE=$(df "$WORK_DIR" | tail -1 | awk '{print $4}')
if [ "$AVAILABLE_SPACE" -lt 102400 ]; then
    echo "[ERROR] $WORK_DIR ã®ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚¯ç©ºãå®¹é‡ãŒä¸è¶³ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚" | tee -a "$DEBUG_LOG"
    exit 1
fi

# ãƒ­ã‚°å‡ºåŠ›é–¢æ•°ï¼ˆæ¨™æº–ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼å‡ºåŠ›ã¸å‡ºåŠ›ã—ã€é–¢æ•°æˆ»ã‚Šå€¤ã‚’å¦¨ã’ãªã„ï¼‰
log() {
    local LEVEL=$1
    shift
    local MESSAGE="$@"
    {
        echo "[$LEVEL] $MESSAGE" | tee -a "$DEBUG_LOG" >&2
        logger -t "system_checking_by_chatgpt" "[$LEVEL] $MESSAGE"
    }
}

log "INFO" "ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆå®Ÿè¡Œé–‹å§‹..."

########################################
# APIã‚­ãƒ¼èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿
########################################

OPENAI_KEY_FILE="/home/your_user_name/.openai_api_key"
if [ ! -f "$OPENAI_KEY_FILE" ]; then
    log "ERROR" "$OPENAI_KEY_FILE ãŒå­˜åœ¨ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚"
    exit 1
fi

OPENAI_API_KEY=$(cat "$OPENAI_KEY_FILE")
if [ -z "$OPENAI_API_KEY" ]; then
    log "ERROR" "OPENAI_API_KEY ãŒç©ºã§ã™ã€‚"
    exit 1
fi
export OPENAI_API_KEY

log "INFO" "APIã‚­ãƒ¼ã‚’æ­£å¸¸ã«èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚"

API_URL="https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions"
MODEL="gpt-4o"

########################################
# é–¢æ•°å®šç¾©
########################################

collect_system_info() {
    {
        echo "=== ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ç¨¼åƒæ™‚é–“ (uptime) ==="
        uptime
        echo ""

        echo "=== æ—¥æ™‚æƒ…å ± ==="
        date
        echo ""

        echo "=== CPUãƒ»ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªä½¿ç”¨çŠ¶æ³ ==="
        top -b -n1 | head -n 20
        echo ""

        echo "=== ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªä½¿ç”¨çŠ¶æ³ (free) ==="
        free -h
        echo ""

        echo "=== ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚¯ä½¿ç”¨é‡ (df) ==="
        df -h
        echo ""

        echo "=== ç•°å¸¸ãªã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ä¸€è¦§ (Failed Services) ==="
        systemctl list-units --state=failed
        echo ""

        echo "=== æ¸©åº¦ã‚»ãƒ³ã‚µãƒ¼æƒ…å ± ==="
        sensors 2>/dev/null || echo "[WARNING] æ¸©åº¦æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚"
        echo ""

        echo "=== NVMe / SMART çŠ¶æ…‹ ==="
        sudo smartctl -a /dev/nvme0n1 2>/dev/null || echo "[WARNING] /dev/nvme0n1 ã‚’ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚"
        echo ""
        sudo smartctl -a /dev/nvme1n1 2>/dev/null || echo "[WARNING] /dev/nvme1n1 ã‚’ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚"
        echo ""

        echo "=== dmesg (ç›´è¿‘100è¡Œ) ==="
        dmesg | tail -n 100
        echo ""

        echo "=== ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ¼ãƒŠãƒ« (ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã®ã¿ç›´è¿‘300è¡Œ) ==="
        journalctl -p err -n 300
        echo ""

        echo "=== ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯çŠ¶æ³ (ss -tulpn) ==="
        ss -tulpn 2>/dev/null || echo "[WARNING] ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯çŠ¶æ³ã‚’å–å¾—ã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚"
        echo ""

        echo "=== ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ•ã‚§ã‚¤ã‚¹çµ±è¨ˆ (ip -s link) ==="
        ip -s link
        echo ""

        echo "=== Dockerã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠä¸€è¦§ (ã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆ) ==="
        docker ps -a 2>/dev/null || echo "[INFO] Dockerã¯èµ·å‹•ã—ã¦ã„ãªã„ã‹ã€ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚"
        echo ""

    } > "$RAW_REPORT"
}

generate_chunk_summaries() {
    # RAW_REPORTã‚’ãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚¯åˆ†å‰²
    CHUNK_SIZE=200
    split -l $CHUNK_SIZE "$RAW_REPORT" "$CHUNKS_DIR/chunk_"

    CHUNKS=("$CHUNKS_DIR"/chunk_*)

    if [ ${#CHUNKS[@]} -eq 0 ]; then
        log "ERROR" "ãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚¯ãŒç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸã€‚"
        exit 1
    fi

    # ãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚¯ã”ã¨ã®è¦ç´„ç”¨ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒˆ
    CHUNK_SYSTEM_PROMPT="ã‚ãªãŸã¯ãƒ—ãƒ­ã®ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ç®¡ç†ã‚³ãƒ³ã‚µãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒ³ãƒˆã§ã™ã€‚ä»¥ä¸‹ã¯ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ æƒ…å ±ã®ä¸€éƒ¨ã§ã™ã€‚ã“ã®æƒ…å ±ã‹ã‚‰ä»¥ä¸‹ã‚’æŠ½å‡ºã—ã¦è¦ç´„ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼š (1) é‡è¦ãªã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ çŠ¶æ…‹æƒ…å ±ï¼ˆCPU/ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªä½¿ç”¨ç‡ã€ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚¯ä½¿ç”¨ç‡ã€ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯çŠ¶æ³ã€ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ç¨¼åƒçŠ¶æ³ã€ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãªã©ï¼‰ã€(2) ç•°å¸¸ã‚„ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã€æ³¨æ„ãŒå¿…è¦ãªäº‹è±¡ã€‚å¯èƒ½ãªé™ã‚Šè©³ç´°ã«ã€ã‹ã¤æ•´ç†ã•ã‚ŒãŸå½¢ã§è¨˜è¿°ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚"

    summaries=()

    for chunk_file in "${CHUNKS[@]}"; do
        CHUNK_CONTENT=$(cat "$chunk_file")

        CHUNK_API_PAYLOAD=$(jq -n \
            --arg system_prompt "$CHUNK_SYSTEM_PROMPT" \
            --arg user_prompt "$CHUNK_CONTENT" \
            --arg model "$MODEL" \
            '{
                "model": $model,
                "messages": [
                    {"role": "system", "content": $system_prompt},
                    {"role": "user", "content": $user_prompt}
                ]
            }')

        log "INFO" "$chunk_file ã®è¦ç´„ãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œã—ã¾ã™..."
        START_TIME=$(date +%s)
        RESPONSE=$(curl -sS -X POST "$API_URL" \
          -H "Authorization: Bearer $OPENAI_API_KEY" \
          -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
          -d "$CHUNK_API_PAYLOAD")

        if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
            log "ERROR" "ChatGPT APIã¨ã®é€šä¿¡ã«å¤±æ•— (è¦ç´„æ®µéš): $chunk_file"
            exit 1
        fi
        END_TIME=$(date +%s)
        log "INFO" "APIãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆæ‰€è¦æ™‚é–“: $((END_TIME - START_TIME)) ç§’ã€‚"

        SUMMARY=$(echo "$RESPONSE" | jq -r '.choices[0].message.content' 2>>"$DEBUG_LOG" || echo "")

        if [ -z "$SUMMARY" ] || [ "$SUMMARY" = "null" ]; then
            log "ERROR" "$chunk_file ã®è¦ç´„å–å¾—ã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚"
            echo "Raw Response: $RESPONSE" >> "$DEBUG_LOG"
            exit 1
        fi

        SUMMARY_FILE="$SUMMARY_DIR/summary_$(basename "$chunk_file").txt"
        echo "$SUMMARY" > "$SUMMARY_FILE"
        summaries+=("$SUMMARY_FILE")
    done

    # è¦ç´„ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’æ¨™æº–å‡ºåŠ›ã¸è¿”ã™
    for s in "${summaries[@]}"; do
        echo "$s"
    done
}

combine_summaries() {
    local summaries=("$@")
    COMBINED_SUMMARY="$WORK_DIR/combined_summary_$DATE.txt"
    rm -f "$COMBINED_SUMMARY"
    touch "$COMBINED_SUMMARY"

    log "INFO" "å…¨ãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚¯è¦ç´„ã‚’çµ±åˆã—ã¾ã™..."
    {
        echo "ä»¥ä¸‹ã¯è¤‡æ•°ãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚¯ã®è¦ç´„ã‚’çµ±åˆã—ãŸçµæœã§ã™ï¼š"
        echo "------------------------------------"
        for sfile in "${summaries[@]}"; do
            echo "=== ãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚¯è¦ç´„ ==="
            cat "$sfile"
            echo ""
        done
    } > "$COMBINED_SUMMARY"

    echo "$COMBINED_SUMMARY"
}

generate_final_report() {
    local COMBINED_SUMMARY="$1"

    # HEREDOCã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒˆã‚’è¨˜è¿°
    FINAL_SYSTEM_PROMPT=$(cat <<EOF

**1. ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ç¾æ³ã®è¨˜è¿°**ï¼š

}

import { useDoc } from "@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs/client";
import { ThemeClassNames } from "@docusaurus/theme-common";
import DocItemAuthors from "@theme/DocItem/Authors";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import MDXContent from "@theme/MDXContent";
import clsx from "clsx";
import React from "react";

function useSyntheticTitle() {
  const { metadata, frontMatter, contentTitle } = useDoc();
  const shouldRender =
    !frontMatter.hide_title && typeof contentTitle === "undefined";
  if (!shouldRender) {
    return null;
  }
  return metadata.title;
}

export default function DocItemContent({ children }) {
  const syntheticTitle = useSyntheticTitle();

  return (
    <div className={clsx(ThemeClassNames.docs.docMarkdown, "markdown")}>
      {syntheticTitle ? (
        <header>
          <Heading as="h1">{syntheticTitle}</Heading>
          <DocItemAuthors />
          <MDXContent>{children}</MDXContent>
        </header>
      ) : (
        <>
          <DocItemAuthors />
          <MDXContent>{children}</MDXContent>
        </>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}

import { useDoc } from "@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs/client";
import authorsData from "@site/blog/authors.json";
import React from "react";
import {
  FaEnvelope,
  FaGithub,
  FaLinkedin,
  FaRss,
  FaStackOverflow,
  FaTwitter,
} from "react-icons/fa";
import styles from "./index.module.css";

function normalizeSocialLink(platform, handleOrUrl) {
  const isAbsoluteUrl =
    handleOrUrl.startsWith("http://") || handleOrUrl.startsWith("https://");
  if (isAbsoluteUrl) {
    return handleOrUrl;
  }
  switch (platform) {
    case "x":
      return `https://x.com/${handleOrUrl}`;
    case "github":
      return `https://github.com/${handleOrUrl}`;
    case "linkedin":
      return `https://www.linkedin.com/in/${handleOrUrl}/`;
    case "stackoverflow":
      return `https://stackoverflow.com/users/${handleOrUrl}`;
    case "newsletter":
      return handleOrUrl;
    case "email":
      return `mailto:${handleOrUrl}`;
    default:
      return handleOrUrl;
  }
}

const socialIconMap = {
  x: FaTwitter,
  github: FaGithub,
  linkedin: FaLinkedin,
  stackoverflow: FaStackOverflow,
  email: FaEnvelope,
  newsletter: FaRss,
};

export default function DocItemAuthors() {
  const { frontMatter } = useDoc();
  let { authors } = frontMatter;

  if (!authors) {
    return null;
  }

  if (typeof authors === "string") {
    authors = [authors];
  }

  const resolvedAuthors = authors
    .map((authorKeyOrObj) => {
      if (typeof authorKeyOrObj === "string") {
        const authorInfo = authorsData[authorKeyOrObj];
        if (!authorInfo) {
          console.warn(
            `No author data found for key '${authorKeyOrObj}' in authors.json`
          );
          return null;
        }
        return {
          name: authorInfo.name,
          title: authorInfo.title,
          url: authorInfo.url,
          imageURL: authorInfo.image_url,
          socials: authorInfo.socials,
          description: authorInfo.description,
        };
      } else {
        const { name, title, url, image_url, imageURL, socials, description } =
          authorKeyOrObj;
        return {
          name,
          title,
          url,
          imageURL: imageURL || image_url,
          socials,
          description,
        };
      }
    })
    .filter(Boolean);

  if (resolvedAuthors.length === 0) {
    return null;
  }

  return (
    <div className={`${styles.docAuthors} margin-bottom--md`}>
      {resolvedAuthors.map((author, index) => {
        const { name, title, url, imageURL, socials, description } = author;
        return (
          <div key={index} className={styles.docAuthor}>
            {imageURL && (
              <img src={imageURL} alt={name} className={styles.docAuthorImg} />
            )}
            <div>
              <div className={styles.docAuthorName}>
                {url ? (
                  <a href={url} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
                    {name}
                  </a>
                ) : (
                  name
                )}
              </div>
              {title && <div className={styles.docAuthorTitle}>{title}</div>}
              {description && (
                <div className={styles.docAuthorDesc}>{description}</div>
              )}

              {socials && (
                <div className={styles.docAuthorSocials}>
                  {Object.entries(socials).map(([platform, handleOrUrl]) => {
                    const SocialIcon = socialIconMap[platform] || FaEnvelope;
                    const normalizedUrl = normalizeSocialLink(
                      platform,
                      handleOrUrl
                    );
                    return (
                      <a
                        key={platform}
                        href={normalizedUrl}
                        target="_blank"
                        rel="noopener noreferrer"
                        className={styles.docAuthorSocialLink}
                      >
                        <SocialIcon size={20} />
                      </a>
                    );
                  })}
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        );
      })}
    </div>
  );
}

.docAuthor {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.docAuthorImg {

  height: 60px;

}

}

.docAuthorSocialLink:hover {

}

# [20.08] HiPPO

[**HiPPO: Recurrent Memory with Optimal Polynomial Projections**](https://arxiv.org/abs/2008.07669)

ä»Šã€è‘—è€…æƒ…å ±ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ã€ã€Œ#ã€ã‚’ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã¨ã—ã¦ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã¯ã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ãã®ä»£ã‚ã‚Šã«FrontMatterã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã‚’å®šç¾©ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
